p: Every single organic chemical purchased from Merck (Darmstadt, Germany) (methanol, dimethyl sulfoxide) was of analytical quality. Purchased standard quercetin was from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA); whereas the AGE, from yeast maltase, was obtained from Megazyme, Ireland. Besides this, the Î±-glucosidase (PNPG) was obtained from Sigma-Aldrich.
